data.eml:eml: Systematics, palaeoecology and taphonomy of Turonian oysters from the northern Gabon Coastal Basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Musavu Moussavou, Benjamin (2017): Systematics, palaeoecology and taphonomy of Turonian oysters from the northern Gabon Coastal Basin. Geodiversitas 39 (2): 213-224, DOI: 10.5252/g2017n2a3
